attributes.action: A Plan B of the plan delaying the Corona Virus outbreak.Build a new CV hospital.
attributes.additional_details: What If the NHS cannot cope with the outbreak in summer? There must be a plan B. My suggestion and demand is for the UK parliament to take drastic measures to prepare. China completed hospitals in 10 days. Surely in the UK  we can also build a new hospital specialising in the CV.
attributes.background: Parliament needs to take more drastic and proactive measures.  The current plan has fundamental flaws : delay the outbreak untill summer , when the NHS can cope, by testing ONLY people travelled to/from and in contact with people from High Risk Countries. This is yo put simply negligent.

rejection.details:
Decisions about opening new hospitals are made by individual NHS Trusts, not the Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to make funding available for new hospitals, to respond to the demands of the coronavirus outbreak.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
